arts.ttl: Trent Alexander-Arnold mural vandalised ahead of Liverpool return for Real Madrid
arts.sum: The former Liverpool player is expected to receive a hostile reception with new club Real Madrid in the crunch Champions League clash at Anfield

arts.ttl: Mural of Real Madrid player Trent Alexander-Arnold vandalized in Liverpool: "Goodbye, rat"
arts.sum: "It was a mural that represented more than just a player, it represented a story of overcoming adversity and love for the club," a local resident told MARCA . It was the mural dedicated to Trent Alexander-Arnold, one of the prodigal sons of the neighborhood, the boy who grew up in the streets of West Derby dreaming of wearing the Liverpool shirt...

arts.ttl: Not Mbappe or Vinicius – Liverpool boss identifies Real Madrid’s biggest threat ahead of UCL showdown
arts.sum: A fascinating clash awaits later tonight as Real Madrid and Liverpool are set to face off in the UEFA Champions League in one of the league stage’s biggest games. Los Blancos have faced off against the Merseyside club several times in recent years and have usually had the upper hand over them. arts.ttl: Xabi Alonso made his reasons for snubbing Liverpool job clear after Jurgen Klopp decision
arts.sum: Real Madrid boss Xabi Alonso was heavily linked with the Liverpool job after Jurgen Klopp's exit, but the Reds later appointed Arne Slot

arts.ttl: Florian Wirtz defended yet again, this time by former boss Xabi Alonso
arts.sum: Florian Wirtz has gone through a tough time since his big-money move from Liverpool but he has certainly not been short of support as team-mates, former colleagues and Reds manager Arne Slot have continually backed him to come good at Anfield. Wirtz found the best form of his career under current Real Madrid boss Xabi Alonso at Leverkusen and the pair are on opposing teams on Tuesday as Liverpool host Los Blancos in the Champions League.

arts.ttl: Revealed: Virgil van Dijk contacted Real Madrid over free transfer before signing Liverpool contract as Spanish giants opted to pursue Dean Huijsen instead
arts.sum: Rooney said: "Virgil van Dijk and Mohamed Salah, they've signed new deals but I don't think they've really led that team this season. Liverpool have struggled for consistency this season despite retaining Van Dijk and investing heavily during a major summer transfer window.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid will closely monitor Liverpool mainstay in Champions League showdown
arts.sum: As Real Madrid prepare to face Liverpool in their highly anticipated UEFA Champions League encounter, a fascinating subplot involving Ibrahima Konate has emerged. arts.ttl: Xabi Alonso, Fabinho & Co. - Every player to play for Liverpool & Real Madrid ahead of UCL showdown
arts.sum: There's a heavyweight Champions League clash taking place at Anfield this Tuesday as Liverpool welcome 15-time winners Real Madrid to Merseyside. The Reds come into the game having taken six points...

arts.ttl: Trent Alexander-Arnold mural appears to be 'defaced' before Liverpool vs Real Madrid clash
arts.sum: A tribute to former Liverpool defender Trent Alexander-Arnold appears to have been vandalised hours before his Champions League return to Anfield with Real Madrid

arts.ttl: Valverde, Camavinga start in a 4-3-3 – How Real Madrid can line up against Liverpool
arts.sum: Real Madrid are preparing for one of their most daunting European tests yet, which is a trip to Anfield to face Liverpool in the UEFA Champions League group stage.
